T09ajm_u:416: tvām attum abhyudgatam etad asmāj jvālograjihvaṃ narakāntakāsyam // AJm_4.7 //
T09ajm_u:417: tat sādhu dānād viniyaccha buddhim evaṃ hi sadyaḥ patanaṃ na te syāt /
T09ajm_u:418: viceṣṭamānaiḥ karuṇaṃ rudadbhir mā dātṛbhir gāḥ samatām amībhiḥ // AJm_4.8 //
T09ajm_u:420: tat svargamārgāvaraṇād viramya dānodyamāt saṃyamam āśrayasva // AJm_4.9 //
T09ajm_u:421: atha bodhisattvo nūnam asyaitad durātmano maddānavighnāya viceṣṭitam ity avagamya svasattvāvaṣṭambhadhīravinayamadhurākṣarāvicchedaṃ niyatam ity avocad enam /
T09ajm_u:423: yuktā viśeṣeṇa ca daivateṣu parānukampānipuṇā pravṛttiḥ // AJm_4.10 //
T09ajm_u:424: doṣodayāt pūrvam anantaraṃ vā yuktaṃ tu tacchāntipathena gantum /
T09ajm_u:425: gate prayāmaṃ hy apacāradoṣair vyādhau cikitsāpraṇayo vighātaḥ // AJm_4.11 //
T09ajm_u:426: idaṃ ca dānavyasanaṃ madīyaṃ śaṅke cikitsāviṣayavyatītam /
T09ajm_u:427: tathā hy anādṛtya hitaiṣitāṃ te na me manaḥ saṃkucati pradānāt // AJm_4.12 //
T09ajm_u:428: dānād adharmaṃ ca yad ūcivāṃs tvam arthaṃ ca dharmasya viśeṣahetum /
T09ajm_u:429: tan mānuṣī neyam avaiti buddhir dānād ṛte dharmapatho yathārthaḥ // AJm_4.13 //
T09ajm_u:430: nidhīyamānaḥ sa tu dharmahetuś cauraiḥ prasahyātha vilupyamānaḥ /
T09ajm_u:432: yac cārthadātā narakaṃ prayāti pratigrahītā tu surendralokam /
T09ajm_u:433: vivardhitas tena ca me tvayāyaṃ dānodyamaḥ saṃyamayiṣyatāpi // AJm_4.15 //
T09ajm_u:434: ananyathā cāstu vacas tavedaṃ svargaṃ ca me yācanakā vrajantu /
T09ajm_u:435: dānaṃ hi me lokahitārtham iṣṭaṃ nedaṃ svasaukhyodayasādhanāya // AJm_4.16 //
T09ajm_u:436: atha māraḥ punar api bodhisattvaṃ hitaiṣīva dhīrahastenovāca /
T09ajm_u:437: hitoktim enāṃ mama cāpalaṃ vā samīkṣya yenecchasi tena gaccha /
T09ajm_u:438: sukhānvito vā bahumānapūrvaṃ smartāsi māṃ vipratisāravān vā // AJm_4.17 //
T09ajm_u:441: kāmaṃ patāmi narakaṃ sphuradugravahniṃ jvālāvalīḍhaśithilāvanatena mūrdhnā /
T09ajm_u:442: na tv arthināṃ praṇayadarśitasauhṛdānāṃ saṃmānakālam avamānanayā hariṣye // AJm_4.18 //
T09ajm_u:443: ity uktvā bodhisattvaḥ svabhāgyabalāvaṣṭabdho jānānaś ca niratyayatāṃ dānasya nivāraṇaikarasam
T09ajm_u:444: avadhūya svajanaparijanaṃ sādhvasānabhibhūtamatir abhivṛddhadānābhilāṣo narakamadhyena prāyāt /
T09ajm_u:445: puṇyānubhāvād atha tasya tasminn apaṅkajaṃ paṅkajam udbabhūva /
T09ajm_u:446: avajñayevāvajahāsa māraṃ yac chuklayā kesaradantapaṅktyā // AJm_4.19 //
T09ajm_u:447: atha bodhisattvaḥ padmasaṃkrameṇa svapuṇyātiśayanirjātenābhigamya pratyekabuddhaṃ prasādasaṃharṣāpūrṇahṛdayaḥ piṇḍapātam asmai prāyacchat //
T09ajm_u:449: varṣañ jvalaṃś caiva sa tatra reje savidyududdyotapayodalakṣmyā // AJm_4.20 //
T09ajm_u:450: avamṛditamanorathas tu māro dyutiparimoṣam avāpya vaimanasyāt /
T09ajm_u:451: tam abhimukham udīkṣituṃ na sehe saha narakeṇa tatas tirobabhūva // AJm_4.21 //
T09ajm_u:454: kena nāma svasthena na dātavyaṃ syād iti
T09ajm_u:455: na sattvavantaḥ śakyante bhayād apy agatiṃ gamayitum ity evam apy upaneyam //
T09ajm_u:458: na vibhavakṣayāśaṅkayā samṛddhyāśayā vā pradānavaidhuryam upayānti satpuruṣāḥ //
T09ajm_u:461: vibhavasaṃpadā sarvātithitvād anuparatadānasattro lokahitārthapravṛtto dāyakaśreṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhī babhūva /
T09ajm_u:464: yathārthināṃ darśanam āsa tasya tathārthināṃ darśanam āsa tasya // AJm_5.1 //
T09ajm_u:465: dehīti yācñāniyatārtham ukto nāstīti nāsau gadituṃ śaśāka /
T09ajm_u:466: hṛtāvakāśā hi babhūva citte tasyārthasaktiḥ kṛpayā mahatyā // AJm_5.2 //
T09ajm_u:468: viveda sa hy ugraghanān anarthān akāraṇakṣipravināśino 'rthān // AJm_5.3 //
T09ajm_u:469: bhavanti lokasya ca bhūyasārthā lobhāśrayā durgatimārgasārthāḥ /
T09ajm_u:470: parātmanor abhyudayāvahatvād arthās tadīyās tu babhur yathārthāḥ // AJm_5.4 //
T09ajm_u:471: atha tasya mahāsattvasya yathābhilaṣitair akliṣṭaiḥ śiṣṭopacāravibhūṣaṇair vipulair
T09ajm_u:472: arthavisargair yācanakajanaṃ samantataḥ saṃtarpayataḥ pradānaudāryaśravaṇād vismayāvarjitamanāḥ
T09ajm_u:473: śakro devendraḥ pradānasthiraniścayatām asya jijñāsamānaḥ pratyahaṃ dhanadhānyaratnaparicchadajātaṃ
T09ajm_u:477: yathā yathā tasya vineśur arthāḥ sūryābhisṛṣṭā iva toyaleśāḥ /
T09ajm_u:478: tathā tathaitān vipulaiḥ pradānair gṛhāt pradīptād iva nirjahāra // AJm_5.5 //
T09ajm_u:479: atha śakro devendras tyāgaparāyaṇam eva taṃ mahāsattvam avetya prakṣīyamāṇavibhavasāram
T09ajm_u:480: api vismitataramatis tasyaikarātreṇa sarvaṃ vibhavasāram antardhāpayām āsānyatra
T09ajm_u:482: atha bodhisattvaḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ yathocitaṃ prativibuddhaḥ paśyati sma dhanadhānyaparicchadaparijanarddhiśūnyaṃ
T09ajm_u:483: niṣkūjadīnaṃ svabhavanaṃ rākṣasair ivodvāsitam anabhirāmadarśanaṃ kim idam iti ca
T09ajm_u:484: samutthitavitarkaḥ samanuvicaraṃs tad rajjukuṇḍalakaṃ dātraṃ ca kevalam atra dadarśa /
T09ajm_u:486: yadi tāvat kena cid yācitum anucitavacasā svavikramopajīvinā madgṛhe praṇaya evaṃ darśitaḥ sūpayuktā eva me 'rthāḥ /
T09ajm_u:487: atha tv idānīṃ madbhāgyadoṣād ucchrayam asahamānāḥ kena cid anupayuktā eva vidrutās tat kaṣṭam /
T09ajm_u:488: calaṃ sauhṛdam arthānāṃ viditaṃ pūrvam eva me /
T09ajm_u:489: arthinām eva pīḍā tu dahaty atra mano mama // AJm_5.6 //
T09ajm_u:490: pradānasatkārasukhocitāś ciraṃ viviktam arthair abhigamya madgṛham /
T09ajm_u:491: kathaṃ bhaviṣyanti nu te mamārthinaḥ pipāsitāḥ śuṣkam ivāgatā hradam // AJm_5.7 //
T09ajm_u:492: atha bodhisattvaḥ svadhairyāvaṣṭambhād anāsvāditaviṣādadainyas tasyām apy avasthāyām anabhyastayācñākramatvāt parān yācituṃ paricitān api na prasehe /
T09ajm_u:493: evaṃ duṣkaraṃ yācitum iti tasya bhūyasī yācanakajaneṣv anukampā babhūva//
T09ajm_u:494: atha sa mahātmā yācanakajanasvāgatādikriyāvekṣayā svayam eva tad rajjukuṇḍalakaṃ
T09ajm_u:495: dātraṃ ca parigṛhya pratyahaṃ tṛṇavikrayopalabdhayā vibhavamātrayārthijanapraṇayasaṃmānanaṃ cakāra //
T09ajm_u:496: atha śakro devendras tasyemām aviṣāditāṃ parame 'pi dāridrye pradānābhimukhatāṃ cāvekṣya
T09ajm_u:497: savismayabahumānaḥ saṃdṛśyamānadivyādbhutavapur antarikṣe sthitvā dānād vicchandayaṃs
T09ajm_u:499: suhṛnmanastāpakarīm avasthām imām upetas tvam atipradānaiḥ /
T09ajm_u:500: na dasyubhir naiva jalānalābhyāṃ na rājabhiḥ saṃhriyamāṇavittaḥ // AJm_5.8 //
T09ajm_u:501: tat tvā hitāvekṣitayā bravīmi niyaccha dānavyasanānurāgam /
T09ajm_u:502: itthaṃgataḥ sann api cen na dadyā yāyāḥ punaḥ pūrvasamṛddhiśobhām // AJm_5.9 //
T09ajm_u:503: śaśvat kṛśenāpi parivyayeṇa kālena dṛṣṭvā kṣayam añjanānām /
T09ajm_u:504: cayena valmīkasamucchrayāṃś ca vṛddhyarthinaḥ saṃyama eva panthāḥ // AJm_5.10 //
T09ajm_u:505: atha bodhisattvaḥ pradānābhyāsamāhātmyaṃ vidarśayañ chakram uvāca /
T09ajm_u:506: anāryam āryeṇa sahasranetra suduṣkaraṃ suṣṭhv api durgatena /
T09ajm_u:507: mā caiva tad bhūn mama śakra vittaṃ yatprāptihetoḥ kṛpaṇāśayaḥ syām // AJm_5.11 //
T09ajm_u:508: icchanti yācñāmaraṇena gantuṃ duḥkhasya yasya pratikāramārgam /
T09ajm_u:509: tenāturān kaḥ kulaputramānī nāstīti śuṣkāśaninābhihanyāt // AJm_5.12 //
T09ajm_u:510: tan madvidhaḥ kiṃ svid upādadīta ratnaṃ dhanaṃ vā divi vāpi rājyam /
T09ajm_u:511: yācñābhitāpena vivarṇitāni prasādayen nārthimukhāni yena // AJm_5.13 //
T09ajm_u:512: mātsaryadoṣopacayāya yaḥ syān na tyāgacittaṃ paribṛṃhayed vā /
T09ajm_u:513: sa tyāgam evārhati madvidhebhyaḥ parigrahacchadmamayo vighātaḥ // AJm_5.14 //
T09ajm_u:515: dāne nidāne ca sukhodayānāṃ mātsaryam āryaḥ ka ivāśrayeta // AJm_5.15 //
T09ajm_u:516: tad darśitā śakra mayi svateyaṃ hitābhidhānād anukampito 'smi /
T09ajm_u:517: svabhyastaharṣaṃ tu manaḥ pradānais tadutpathe kena dhṛtiṃ labheta // AJm_5.16 //
T09ajm_u:518: na cātra manyor anuvṛttimārge cittaṃ bhavān arhati saṃniyoktum /
T09ajm_u:519: na hi svabhāvasya vipakṣadurgam āroḍhum alpena balena śakyam // AJm_5.17 //
T09ajm_u:522: paryāptavibhavasya paripūrṇakośakoṣṭhāgārasya samyakpravṛttavividhavipulakarmāntasya virūḍhāyater loke vaśīkṛtaiśvaryasyāyaṃ kramo nemāṃ daśām abhiprapannasya / paśya /
T09ajm_u:524: samṛddhim ākṛṣya śubhena karmaṇā sapatnatejāṃsy abhibhūya bhānuvat // AJm_5.18 //
T09ajm_u:525: jane prasaṅgena vitatya saṃnatiṃ prabodhya harṣaṃ sasuhṛtsu bandhuṣu /
T09ajm_u:526: avāptasaṃmānavidhir nṛpād api śriyā pariṣvakta ivābhikāmyayā // AJm_5.19 //
T09ajm_u:527: atha pradāne pravijṛmbhitakramaḥ sukheṣu vā naiti janasya vācyatām /
T09ajm_u:528: ajātapakṣaḥ kham ivārurukṣayā vighātabhāk kevalayā tu ditsayā // AJm_5.20 //
T09ajm_u:529: yato dhanaṃ saṃyamanaibhṛtāśrayād upārjyatāṃ tāvad alaṃ praditsayā /
T09ajm_u:530: anāryatāpy atra ca nāma kā bhaven na yat pradadyād vibhaveṣv abhāviṣu // AJm_5.21 //
T09ajm_u:533: ātmārthaḥ syād yasya garīyān parakāryāt tenāpi syād deyam anādṛtya samṛddhim /
T09ajm_u:534: naiti prītiṃ tāṃ hi mahatyāpi vibhūtyā dānais tuṣṭiṃ lobhajayād yām upabhuṅkte // AJm_5.22 //
T09ajm_u:535: naiti svargaṃ kevalayā yac ca samṛddhyā dānenaiva khyātim avāpnoti ca puṇyām /
T09ajm_u:536: mātsaryādīn nābhibhavaty eva ca doṣāṃs tasyā hetor dānam ataḥ ko na bhajeta // AJm_5.23 //
T09ajm_u:537: trātuṃ lokān yas tu jarāmṛtyuparītān apy ātmānaṃ ditsati kāruṇyavaśena /
T09ajm_u:538: yo nāsvādaṃ vetti sukhānāṃ paraduḥkhaiḥ kas tasyārthas tvadgatayā syād api lakṣmyā // AJm_5.24 //
T09ajm_u:540: saṃpattir iva vittānām adhruvā sthitir āyuṣaḥ /
T09ajm_u:541: iti yācanakaṃ labdhvā na samṛddhir avekṣyate // AJm_5.25 //
T09ajm_u:542: eko rathaś ca bhuvi yad vidadhāti vartma tenāparo vrajati dhṛṣṭataraṃ tathānyaḥ /
T09ajm_u:543: kalyāṇam ādyam imam ity avadhūya mārgaṃ nāsatpathapraṇayane ramate mano me // AJm_5.26 //
T09ajm_u:544: arthaś ca vistaram upaiṣyati cet punar me hartā manāṃsi niyamena sa yācakānām /
T09ajm_u:545: evaṃgate 'pi ca yathāvibhavaṃ pradāsye mā caiva dānaniyame pramadiṣma śakra // AJm_5.27 //
T09ajm_u:546: ity ukte śakro devendraḥ samabhiprasāditamanāḥ sādhu sādhv ity enam abhisaṃrādhya sabahumānasnigdham avekṣamāṇa uvāca /
T09ajm_u:547: yaśaḥsapatnair api karmabhir janaḥ samṛddhim anvicchati nīcadāruṇaiḥ /
T09ajm_u:548: svasaukhyasaṅgād anapekṣitātyayaḥ pratāryamāṇaś capalena cetasā // AJm_5.28 //
T09ajm_u:549: acintayitvā tu dhanakṣayaṃ tvayā svasaukhyahāniṃ mama ca pratāraṇām /
T09ajm_u:552: pradānasaṃkocavirūpatāṃ gataṃ dhane pranaṣṭe 'pi na yat tadāśayā // AJm_5.30 //
T09ajm_u:553: na cātra citraṃ paraduḥkhaduḥkhinaḥ kṛpāvaśāl lokahitaiṣiṇas tava /
T09ajm_u:554: himāvadātaḥ śikharīva vāyunā na yat pradānād asi kampito mayā // AJm_5.31 //
T09ajm_u:555: yaśaḥ samudbhāvayituṃ parīkṣayā dhanaṃ tavedaṃ tu nigūḍhavān aham /
T09ajm_u:556: maṇir hi śobhānugato 'py ato 'nyathā na saṃspṛśed ratnayaśomahārghatām // AJm_5.32 //
T09ajm_u:557: ataḥ pradānair abhivarṣa yācakān hradān mahāmegha ivābhipūrayan /
T09ajm_u:558: dhanakṣayaṃ nāpsyasi matparigrahād idaṃ kṣamethāś ca viceṣṭitaṃ mama // AJm_5.33 //
T09ajm_u:559: ity enam abhisaṃrādhya śakras tac cāsya vibhavasāram upasaṃhṛtya kṣamayitvā ca tatraivāntardadhe //
T09ajm_u:560: tad evaṃ na vibhavakṣayāpekṣayā samṛddhyāśayā vā pradānavaidhuryam upayānti satpuruṣā iti //
T09ajm_u:563: tiryaggatānām api mahāsattvānāṃ śaktyanurūpā dānapravṛttir dṛṣṭā /
T09ajm_u:564: kena nāma manuṣyabhūtena na dātavyaṃ syāt //
T09ajm_u:566: kasmiṃś cid araṇyapradeśe manojñavīruttṛṇatarunicite puṣpaphalavati vaiḍūryanīlaśucisalilavāhinyā
T09ajm_u:569: sa sattvayogād vapuṣaś ca saṃpadā balaprakarṣād vipulena caujasā /
T09ajm_u:570: atarkitaḥ kṣudramṛgair aśaṅkitaś cacāra tasmin mṛgarājalīlayā // AJm_6.1 //
T09ajm_u:572: munivat tatra śuśubhe tuṣṭacittas tṛṇāṅkuraiḥ // AJm_6.2 //
T09ajm_u:574: āsur jihmitadaurātmyāḥ prāyaḥ śiṣyasukhā mṛgāḥ // AJm_6.3 //
T09ajm_u:575: tasya guṇātiśayasaṃbhṛtena snehagauraveṇa viśeṣavattaram avabaddhahṛdayās trayaḥ sahāyā babhūvur udraḥ śṛgālo vānaraś ca /
T09ajm_u:576: te parasparasaṃbandhanibaddhasnehā iva bāndhavā anyonyapraṇayasaṃmānavirūḍhasauhṛdā iva ca suhṛdaḥ saṃmodamānās tatra viharanti sma /
T09ajm_u:577: tiryaksvabhāvavimukhāś ca prāṇiṣu dayānuvṛttyā laulyapraśamād vismṛtasteyapravṛttyā
T09ajm_u:578: ca dharmānurodhinyā ca vṛttyā paṭuvijñānatvād vinayaniyamadhīrayā ca ceṣṭayā devatānām
T09ajm_u:580: sukhānulome guṇabādhini krame guṇānukūle ca sukhoparodhini /
T09ajm_u:581: naro 'pi tāvad guṇapakṣasaṃśrayād virājate kiṃ bata tiryagākṛtiḥ // AJm_6.4 //
T09ajm_u:582: abhūt sa teṣāṃ tu śaśākṛtiḥ kṛtī parānukampāpratipadgurur guruḥ /
T09ajm_u:583: svabhāvasaṃpac ca guṇakramānugā yaśo yad eṣāṃ suralokam apy agāt // AJm_6.5 //
T09ajm_u:584: atha kadā cit sa mahātmā sāyāhnasamaye dharmaśravaṇārtham abhigataiḥ sabahumānam
T09ajm_u:585: upāsyamānas taiḥ sahāyaiḥ paripūrṇaprāyamaṇḍalam ādityaviprakarṣād vyavadāyamānaśobhaṃ
T09ajm_u:590: tad vyaktaṃ śvaḥ pañcadaśī yato bhavadbhiḥ poṣadhaniyamam abhisaṃpādayadbhir nyāyopalabdhenāhāraviśeṣena kālopanatam atithijanaṃ pratipūjya prāṇasaṃdhāraṇam anuṣṭheyam /
T09ajm_u:593: vidyullatābhaṅguralolam āyus tenaiva kāryo dṛḍham apramādaḥ // AJm_6.7 //
T09ajm_u:594: dānena śīlābharaṇena tasmāt puṇyāni saṃvardhayituṃ yatadhvam /
T09ajm_u:595: vivartamānasya hi janmadurge lokasya puṇyāni parā pratiṣṭhā // AJm_6.8 //
T09ajm_u:596: tārāgaṇānām abhibhūya lakṣmīṃ vibhāti yat kāntiguṇena somaḥ /
T09ajm_u:597: jyotīṃṣi cākramya sahasraraśmir yad dīpyate puṇyaguṇocchrayaḥ saḥ // AJm_6.9 //
T09ajm_u:598: dṛptasvabhāvāḥ sacivā nṛpāś ca puṇyaprabhāvāt pṛthivīśvarāṇām /
T09ajm_u:599: sadaśvavṛttyā hatasarvagarvāḥ prītā ivājñādhuram udvahanti // AJm_6.10 //
T09ajm_u:600: puṇyair vihīnān anuyāty alakṣmīr vispandamānān api nītimārge /
T09ajm_u:601: puṇyādhikaiḥ sā hy avabhartsyamānā paryety amarṣād iva tadvipakṣān // AJm_6.11 //
T09ajm_u:603: śrīmatsu saukhyodayasādhaneṣu puṇyaprasaṅgeṣu matiṃ kurudhvam // AJm_6.12 //
T09ajm_u:604: te tathety asyānuśāsanīṃ pratigṛhyābhivādya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya cainaṃ svaṃ svam ālayam abhijagmuḥ /
T09ajm_u:605: aciragateṣu ca teṣu sahāyeṣu sa mahātmā cintām āpede /
T09ajm_u:606: atither abhyupetasya saṃmānaṃ yena tena vā /
T09ajm_u:607: vidhātuṃ śaktir asty eṣām atra śocyo 'ham eva tu // AJm_6.13 //
T09ajm_u:609: śakyā nātithaye dātuṃ sarvathā dhig aśaktitām // AJm_6.14 //
T09ajm_u:610: ity asāmarthyadīnena ko nv artho jīvitena me /
T09ajm_u:611: ānandaḥ śokatāṃ yāyād yasyaivam atithir mama // AJm_6.15 //
T09ajm_u:612: tat kutredānīm idam atithiparicaryāvaiguṇyān niḥsāraṃ śarīrakam utsṛjyamānaṃ kasya cid upakārāya syād iti vimṛśan sa mahātmā smṛtiṃ pratilebhe / aye /
T09ajm_u:613: svādhīnasulabham etan niravadyaṃ vidyate mamaiva khalu /
T09ajm_u:616: samadhigatam idaṃ mayātitheyaṃ hṛdaya vimuñca yato viṣādadainyam /
T09ajm_u:617: samupanatam anena satkariṣyāmy aham atithipraṇayaṃ śarīrakeṇa // AJm_6.17 //
T09ajm_u:618: iti viniścitya sa mahāsattvaḥ param iva lābham adhigamya paramaprītamanās tatrāvatasthe /
T09ajm_u:620: āviścakre prabhāvaṃ ca prasādaṃ ca divaukasām // AJm_6.18 //
T09ajm_u:621: tataḥ praharṣād iva sācalā calā mahī babhūvānibhṛtārṇavāṃśukā /
T09ajm_u:622: vitastaruḥ khe suradundubhisvanā diśaḥ prasādābharaṇāś cakāśire // AJm_6.19 //
T09ajm_u:624: parasparāśleṣavikīrṇareṇubhiḥ prasaktam enaṃ kusumair avākiran // AJm_6.20 //
T09ajm_u:625: samudvahan dhīragatiḥ samīraṇaḥ sugandhi nānādrumapuṣpajaṃ rajaḥ /
T09ajm_u:626: mudā pravṛddhair avibhaktabhaktibhis tam arcayām āsa kṛśāṃśukair iva // AJm_6.21 //
T09ajm_u:627: tad upalabhya pramuditavismitamanobhir devatābhiḥ samantataḥ parikīrtyamānaṃ tasya
T09ajm_u:628: vitarkādbhutaṃ samāpūryamāṇavismayakautūhalena manasā tasya mahāsattvasya bhāvajijñāsayā
T09ajm_u:629: dvitīye 'hani gaganatalamadhyam abhilaṅghamāne paṭutarakiraṇaprabhāve savitari prasphuritamarīcijālavasanāsu
T09ajm_u:631: vanāntareṣu vicchidyamānapakṣisaṃpāteṣu gharmaklamāpītotsāheṣv adhvageṣu śakro devānām
T09ajm_u:632: adhipatir brāhmaṇarūpī bhūtvā mārgapranaṣṭa ivādhvagaḥ kṣuttarṣaśramaviṣādadīnakaṇṭhaḥ
T09ajm_u:634: ekaṃ sārthāt paribhraṣṭaṃ bhramantaṃ gahane vane /
T09ajm_u:635: kṣucchramaklāntadehaṃ māṃ trātum arhanti sādhavaḥ // AJm_6.22 //
T09ajm_u:636: mārgāmārgajñānaniścetanaṃ māṃ diksaṃmohāt kvāpi gacchantam ekam /
T09ajm_u:637: kāntāre 'smin gharmatarṣaklamārtaṃ mābhaiḥśabdaiḥ ko 'tra māṃ hlādayeta // AJm_6.23 //
T09ajm_u:638: atha te mahāsattvās tena tasyātikaruṇenākranditaśabdena samākampitahṛdayāḥ sasaṃbhramadrutataragatayas taṃ deśam abhijagmuḥ /
T09ajm_u:639: mārgapranaṣṭādhvagadīnadarśanaṃ cainam abhisamīkṣya samabhigamyopacārapuraḥsaraṃ samāśvāsayanta ūcuḥ /
T09ajm_u:640: kāntāre vipranaṣṭo 'ham ity alaṃ saṃbhrameṇa te /
T09ajm_u:641: svasya śiṣyagaṇasyeva samīpe vartase hi naḥ // AJm_6.24 //
T09ajm_u:643: vidhāyānugrahaṃ saumya śvo gantāsi yathepsitam // AJm_6.25 //
T09ajm_u:644: athodras tasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvād anumatam upanimantraṇam avetya harṣasaṃbhramatvaritagatiḥ sapta rohitamatsyān samupanīyāvocad enam /
T09ajm_u:645: mīnāribhir vismaraṇojjhitā vā trāsotplutā vā sthalam abhyupetāḥ /
T09ajm_u:646: khedaprasuptā iva sapta matsyā labdhā mayaitān nivaseha bhuktvā // AJm_6.26 //
T09ajm_u:647: atha śṛgālo 'py enaṃ yathopalabdham annajātam upahṛtya praṇāmapuraḥsaraṃ sādaram uvāca /
T09ajm_u:648: ekāṃ ca godhāṃ dadhibhājanaṃ ca kenāpi saṃtyaktam ihādhyagaccham /
T09ajm_u:649: tan me hitāvekṣitayopayujya vane 'stu te 'smin guṇavāsa vāsaḥ // AJm_6.27 //
T09ajm_u:650: ity uktvā prītamanās tad asmai samupajahāra //
T09ajm_u:651: atha vānaraḥ paripākaguṇāt samupajātamārdavāni manaḥśilācūrṇarañjitānīvātipiñjarāṇy atiraktabandhanamūlāni piṇḍīkṛtāny āmraphalāny ādāya sāñjalipragraham enam uvāca /
T09ajm_u:652: āmrāṇi pakvāny udakaṃ manojñaṃ chāyāś ca satsaṃgamasaukhyaśītāḥ /
T09ajm_u:653: ity asti me brahmavidāṃ variṣṭha bhuktvaitad atraiva tavāstu vāsaḥ // AJm_6.28 //
T09ajm_u:654: atha śaśo 'bhisṛtyainam upacārakriyānantaraṃ sabahumānam udīkṣamāṇaḥ svena śarīreṇopanimantrayām āsa /
T09ajm_u:655: na santi mudgā na tilā na taṇḍulā vane 'bhivṛddhasya śaśasya ke ca na /
T09ajm_u:656: śarīram etat tv analābhisaṃskṛtaṃ mamopayujyādya tapovane vasa // AJm_6.29 //
T09ajm_u:657: yad asti yasyepsitasādhanaṃ dhanaṃ sa tan niyuṅkte 'rthijanāgamotsave /
T09ajm_u:658: na cāsti dehād adhikaṃ ca me dhanaṃ pratīccha sarvasvam idaṃ yato mama // AJm_6.30 //
T09ajm_u:660: anyasyāpi vadhaṃ tāvat kuryād asmadvidhaḥ katham /
T09ajm_u:661: iti darśitasauhārde kathā kaiva bhavadvidhe // AJm_6.31 //
T09ajm_u:662: śaśa uvāca / upapannarūpam idam āsannānukrośe brāhmaṇye /
T09ajm_u:663: tad ihaiva tāvad bhavān āstām asmadanugrahāpekṣayā yāvat kutaś cid ātmānugrahopāyam āsādayāmīti //
T09ajm_u:664: atha śakro devānām indras tasya bhāvam avetya taptatapanīyavarṇaṃ sphuratpratanujvālaṃ vikīryamāṇavisphuliṅgaprakaraṃ nirdhūmam aṅgārarāśim abhinirmame //
T09ajm_u:665: atha śaśaḥ samantato vilokayaṃs tam agniskandhaṃ dadarśa /
T09ajm_u:668: tad asmaccharīropabhogāt saphalām anugrahāśāṃ me kartum arhasi /
T09ajm_u:670: deyaṃ ca ditsāpravaṇaṃ ca cittaṃ bhavadvidhenātithinā ca yogaḥ /
T09ajm_u:671: nāvāptum etad dhi sukhena śakyaṃ tat syād amoghaṃ bhavadāśrayān me // AJm_6.32 //
T09ajm_u:673: tataḥ sa taṃ vahnim abhijvalantaṃ nidhiṃ dhanārthī sahaseva dṛṣṭvā /
T09ajm_u:674: pareṇa harṣeṇa samāruroha toyaṃ hasatpadmam ivaikahaṃsaḥ // AJm_6.33 //
T09ajm_u:675: tad dṛṣṭvā paramavismayāvarjitamatir devānām adhipatiḥ svam eva vapur āsthāya divyakusumavarṣapuraḥsarībhir
T09ajm_u:676: manaḥśrutisukhābhir vāgbhir abhipūjya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ kamalapalāśalakṣmīsamṛddhābhyāṃ
T09ajm_u:677: bhāsurāṅgulivibhūṣaṇālaṃkṛtābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ svayam eva cainaṃ parigṛhya tridaśebhyaḥ saṃdarśayām āsa /
T09ajm_u:678: paśyantv atrabhavantas tridaśālayanivāsino devāḥ samanumodantāṃ cedam ativismayanīyaṃ karmāvadānam asya mahāsattvasya /
T09ajm_u:679: tyaktaṃ batānena yathā śarīraṃ niḥsaṅgam adyātithivatsalena /
T09ajm_u:680: nirmālyam apy evam akampamānā nālaṃ parityaktum adhīrasattvāḥ // AJm_6.34 //
T09ajm_u:681: jātiḥ kveyaṃ tadvirodhi kva cedaṃ tyāgaudāryaṃ cetasaḥ pāṭavaṃ ca /
T09ajm_u:682: vispaṣṭo 'yaṃ puṇyamandādarāṇāṃ pratyādeśo devatānāṃ nṛṇāṃ ca // AJm_6.35 //
T09ajm_u:685: atha śakras tatkarmātiśayavikhyāpanārthaṃ lokahitāvekṣī śaśabimbalakṣaṇena vaijayantasya prāsādavarasya sudharmāyāś ca devasabhāyāḥ kūṭāgārakarṇike candramaṇḍalaṃ cābhyalaṃcakāra /
T09ajm_u:689: kṣaṇadātilakaś candraḥ śaśāṅka iti kīrtyate // AJm_6.38 //
T09ajm_u:690: tad evaṃ tiryaggatānām api mahāsattvānāṃ śaktyanurūpā dānapravṛttir dṛṣṭā /
T09ajm_u:691: kena nāma manuṣyabhūtena na dātavyaṃ syāt //
T09ajm_u:692: tathā tiryaggatā api guṇavātsalyāt saṃpūjyante sadbhir iti guṇeṣv ādaraḥ kārya ity evam apy upaneyam //
T09ajm_u:695: tapovanasthānām apy alaṃkāras tyāgaśauryaṃ prāg eva gṛhasthānām //
T09ajm_u:697: bodhisattvabhūtaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavāṃl lokahitārthaṃ saṃsārādhvani vartamānaś cāritraguṇaviśuddhyabhilakṣitaṃ
T09ajm_u:698: kṣititalatilakabhūtam anyatamaṃ mahad brāhmaṇakulaṃ gaganatalam iva śaradamalaparipūrṇamaṇḍalaś
T09ajm_u:700: sa yathākramaṃ śrutismṛtivihitān avāpya jātakarmādīn saṃskārān adhītya sāṅgān vedān
T09ajm_u:701: kṛtsnaṃ vyāpya vidvadyaśasā manuṣyalokaṃ guṇapriyair dātṛbhir abhyarthya pratigrāhyamāṇavibhavatvāt
T09ajm_u:703: sa bandhumitrāśritadīnavargaṃ saṃmānanīyān atithīn gurūṃś ca /
T09ajm_u:704: prahlādayām āsa tayā samṛddhyā deśān mahāmegha ivābhivarṣan // AJm_7.1 //
T09ajm_u:705: vidvattayā tasya yaśaḥ prakāśaṃ tat tyāgaśauryād adhikaṃ cakāśe /
T09ajm_u:706: niśākarasyeva śaradviśuddhaṃ samagrabhāvād adhikānti bimbam // AJm_7.2 //
T09ajm_u:707: atha sa mahātmā kukāryavyāsaṅgadoṣasaṃbādhaṃ pramādāspadabhūtaṃ dhanārjanarakṣaṇaprasaṅgavyākulam
T09ajm_u:709: kṛśāsvādaṃ gārhasthyam avetya taddoṣaviviktasukhāṃ ca dharmapratipattyanukūlāṃ mokṣadharmārambhādhiṣṭhānabhūtāṃ
T09ajm_u:710: pravrajyām anupaśyan mahatīm api tāṃ dhanasamṛddhim aparikleśādhigatāṃ lokasaṃnatimanoharāṃ
T09ajm_u:712: pravrajitam api taṃ mahāsattvaṃ yaśaḥprakāśatvāt pūrvasaṃstavānusmaraṇāt saṃbhāvitaguṇatvāt praśamābhilakṣitatvāc ca śreyo'rthī janas tadguṇagaṇāvarjitamatis tathaivābhijagāma /
T09ajm_u:713: sa taṃ gṛhijanasaṃsargaṃ pravivekasukhapramāthinaṃ vyāsaṅgavikṣepāntarāyakaram abahumanyamānaḥ
T09ajm_u:716: nānātarubhir upaśobhitaṃ vimalasalilāśayapratīraṃ kārādvīpam adhyāsanād āśramapadaśriyā saṃyojayām āsa /
T09ajm_u:717: sutanus tapasā tatra sa reje tapasātanuḥ /
T09ajm_u:718: navaś candra iva vyomni kāntatvenākṛśaḥ kṛśaḥ // AJm_7.3 //
T09ajm_u:720: munir iti tanubuddhiśaktibhir mṛgavihagair api so 'nvagamyata // AJm_7.4 //
T09ajm_u:721: atha sa mahātmā pradānocitatvāt tapovane 'pi nivasan kālopanatam atithijanaṃ yathāsaṃnihitena
T09ajm_u:722: mūlaphalena śucinā salilena hṛdyābhiś ca svāgatāśīrvādapeśalābhis tapasvijanayogyābhir
T09ajm_u:724: atithijanopayuktaśeṣeṇa ca yātrāmātrārtham abhyavahṛtena vanyenāhāreṇa vartayām āsa //
T09ajm_u:725: tasya tapaḥprakarṣāt pravisṛtena yaśasā samāvarjitahṛdayaḥ śakro devānām indraḥ sthairyajijñāsayā
T09ajm_u:726: tasya mahāsattvasya tasminn araṇyāyatane tāpasajanopabhogayogyaṃ mūlaphalam anupūrveṇa
T09ajm_u:728: bodhisattvo 'pi dhyānaprasṛtamānasatayā saṃtoṣaparicayād anadhimūrchitatvād āhāre śarīre cānabhiṣvaṅgān na tadantardhānahetuṃ manasi cakāra
T09ajm_u:729: sa taruṇāni tarupallavāny adhiśrāya tair āhāraprayojanam abhiniṣpādyāparitṛṣyamāṇa āhāraviśeṣānutsukaḥ svasthamatis tathaiva vijahāra /
T09ajm_u:730: na kva cid durlabhā vṛttiḥ saṃtoṣaniyatātmanām /
T09ajm_u:731: kutra nāma na vidyante tṛṇaparṇajalāśayāḥ // AJm_7.5 //
T09ajm_u:732: vismitataramanās tu śakro devendras tasya tenāvasthānena sthirataraguṇasaṃbhāvanas
T09ajm_u:733: tatparīkṣānimittaṃ tasminn araṇyavanapradeśe nidāghakālānila iva samagraṃ vīruttṛṇatarugaṇaṃ
T09ajm_u:735: atha bodhisattvaḥ pratyārdratarāṇi śīrṇaparṇāni samāhṛtya tair udakasvinnair anutkaṇṭhitamatir vartayamāno dhyānasukhaprīṇitamanās tatrāmṛtatṛpta iva vijahāra /
T09ajm_u:737: saṃtoṣaś ca vanasthānāṃ guṇaśobhāvidhiḥ paraḥ // AJm_7.6 //
T09ajm_u:738: atha śakras tena tasyādbhutarūpeṇa saṃtoṣasthairyeṇa samabhivṛddhavismayaḥ sāmarṣa
T09ajm_u:739: iva tasya mahāsattvasya vratakāle hutāgnihotrasya parisamāptajapasyātithijanadidṛkṣayā
T09ajm_u:740: diśo vyavalokayato brāhmaṇarūpam āsthāyātithir iva nāma purastāt prādurabhūt /
T09ajm_u:742: tūṣṇīṃbhāvāt tu tasyānumatam upanimantraṇam avetya sa mahātmā
T09ajm_u:744: kṛcchropalabdham api tac chrapaṇaṃ samastaṃ tasmai dadau svayam abhūc ca mudaiva tṛptaḥ // AJm_7.7 //
T09ajm_u:745: sa tathaiva praviśya dhyānāgāraṃ tenaiva prītiprāmodyena tad ahorātram atināmayām āsa //
T09ajm_u:746: atha śakras tasya dvitīye tṛtīye cāhani tathaiva vratakāle purataḥ prādurabhūt /
T09ajm_u:747: so 'pi cainaṃ pramuditataramanās tathaiva pratipūjayām āsa/
T09ajm_u:749: naiti saṃkocadīnatvaṃ duḥkhaiḥ prāṇāntikair api // AJm_7.8 //
T09ajm_u:750: atha śakraḥ paramavismayāviṣṭahṛdayas tapaḥprakarṣād asya prārthanāmātrāpekṣaṃ tridaśapatilakṣmīsaṃparkam
T09ajm_u:751: avagamya samutpatitabhayāśaṅkaḥ svam eva vapur divyādbhutaśobham abhiprapadya tapaḥprayojanam enaṃ paryapṛcchat /
T09ajm_u:752: bandhūn priyān aśrumukhān vihāya parigrahān saukhyaparigrahāṃś ca /
T09ajm_u:753: āśāṅkuśaṃ nu vyavasṛjya kutra tapaḥparikleśam imaṃ śrito 'si // AJm_7.9 //
T09ajm_u:754: sukhopapannān paribhūya bhogāñ chokāturaṃ bandhujanaṃ ca kṛtvā /
T09ajm_u:755: na hetunālpena hi yānti dhīrāḥ sukhoparodhīni tapovanāni // AJm_7.10 //
T09ajm_u:756: vaktavyam etan mayi manyase cet kautūhalaṃ no 'rhasi tad vinetum /
T09ajm_u:757: kiṃ nāma tad yasya guṇaśraveṇa vaśīkṛtaivaṃ bhavato 'pi buddhiḥ // AJm_7.11 //
T09ajm_u:760: punaḥpunarjātir atīva duḥkhaṃ jarā vipad vyādhivirūpatā ca /
T09ajm_u:761: martavyam ity ākulatā ca buddher lokān atas trātum iha sthito 'smi // AJm_7.12 //
T09ajm_u:762: atha śakro nāyam asmadgatāṃ śriyaṃ kāmayata iti samāśvāsitahṛdayaḥ subhāṣitena tena
T09ajm_u:763: cābhiprasāditamatir yuktam ity abhipūjya tad asya vacanaṃ varapradānena bodhisattvam
T09ajm_u:766: dadāmi kāśyapa varaṃ tad vṛṇīṣva yad icchasi // AJm_7.13 //
T09ajm_u:767: atha bodhisattvo bhavasukheṣv anāsthaḥ prārthanām eva duḥkham avagacchan sātmībhūtasaṃtoṣaḥ śakram uvāca /
T09ajm_u:768: dātum icchasi cen mahyam anugrahakaraṃ varam /
T09ajm_u:769: vṛṇe tasmād aham imaṃ devānāṃ pravaraṃ varam // AJm_7.14 //
T09ajm_u:770: dārān mano'bhilaṣitāṃs tanayān prabhutvam arthān abhīpsitaviśālatarāṃś ca labdhvā /
T09ajm_u:771: yenābhitaptamatir eti na jātu tṛptiṃ lobhānalaḥ sa hṛdayaṃ mama nābhyupeyāt // AJm_7.15 //
T09ajm_u:772: atha śakras tasya tayā saṃtoṣapravaṇamānasatayā subhāṣitābhivyañjitayā bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃprasāditamatiḥ punar bodhisattvaṃ sādhu sādhv iti praśasya vareṇopacchandayām āsa /
T09ajm_u:774: pratiprābhṛtavat prītyā prayacchāmy aparaṃ varam // AJm_7.16 //
T09ajm_u:775: atha bodhisattvaḥ kleśaviyogasyaiva durlabhatām asya pradarśayan varayācñāpadeśena punar apy asmai dharmaṃ deśayām āsa /
T09ajm_u:776: dadāsi me yadi varaṃ sadguṇāvāsa vāsava /
T09ajm_u:777: vṛṇe tenedam aparaṃ devendrānavaraṃ varam // AJm_7.17 //
T09ajm_u:778: arthād api bhraṃśam avāpnuvanti varṇaprasādād yaśasaḥ sukhāc ca /
T09ajm_u:779: yenābhibhūtā dviṣateva sattvāḥ sa dveṣavahnir mama dūrataḥ syāt // AJm_7.18 //
T09ajm_u:780: tac chrutvā śakro devānām adhipatir vismayavaśāt sādhv ity enaṃ sabahumānam abhipraśasya punar uvāca /
T09ajm_u:782: tad varaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva mad atrāpi subhāṣite // AJm_7.19 //
T09ajm_u:783: atha bodhisattvaḥ kleśaprātikūlyāt kliṣṭasattvasaṃparkavigarhāṃ varasaṃpratigrahāpadeśena kurvann ity uvāca /
T09ajm_u:784: śṛṇuyām api naiva jātu bālaṃ na ca vīkṣeya na cainam ālapeyam /
T09ajm_u:785: na ca tena nivāsakhedaduḥkhaṃ samupeyāṃ varam ity ahaṃ vṛṇe tvām // AJm_7.20 //
T09ajm_u:788: āpadāṃ mūlabhūtatvād bālyaṃ cādhamam iṣyate // AJm_7.21 //
T09ajm_u:790: kṛpālur api san kasmān na darśanam apīcchasi // AJm_7.22 //
T09ajm_u:794: kathaṃ cid api śakyeta yadi bālaś cikitsitum /
T09ajm_u:795: taddhitodyoganiryatnaḥ kathaṃ syād iti madvidhaḥ // AJm_7.23 //
T09ajm_u:797: sunayavad anayaṃ nayaty ayaṃ param api cātra niyoktum icchati /
T09ajm_u:798: anucitavinayārjavakramo hitam api cābhihitaḥ prakupyati // AJm_7.24 //
T09ajm_u:800: rabhase vinayābhiyogamāndyād vada kas tatra hitārpaṇābhyupāyaḥ // AJm_7.25 //
T09ajm_u:802: bālyād adravyabhūtasya na darśanam apīṣyate // AJm_7.26 //
T09ajm_u:803: tac chrutvā śakraḥ sādhu sādhv ity enam abhinandya subhāṣitaparitoṣitamatiḥ punar uvāca /
T09ajm_u:804: na subhāṣitaratnānām arghaḥ kaś ca na vidyate /
T09ajm_u:805: kusumāñjalivat prītyā dadāmy atra tu te varam // AJm_7.27 //
T09ajm_u:806: atha bodhisattvaḥ sarvāvasthasukhatāṃ sajjanasya pradarśayañ chakram uvāca/
T09ajm_u:807: vīkṣeya dhīraṃ śṛṇuyāṃ ca dhīraṃ syān me nivāsaḥ saha tena śakra /
T09ajm_u:808: saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ tena sahaiva bhūyād etad varaṃ devavara prayaccha // AJm_7.28 //
T09ajm_u:810: atipakṣapāta iva khalu te dhīraṃ prati /
T09ajm_u:812: kiṃ nu dhīras tavākārṣīd vada kāśyapa kāraṇam /
T09ajm_u:814: atha bodhisattvaḥ sajjanamāhātmyam asya pradarśayann uvāca /
T09ajm_u:815: śrūyatāṃ mārṣa yena me dhīradarśanam evābhilaṣati matiḥ /
T09ajm_u:816: vrajati guṇapathena ca svayaṃ nayati parān api tena vartmanā /
T09ajm_u:817: vacanam api na rūkṣam akṣamāṃ janayati tasya hitopasaṃhitam // AJm_7.30 //
T09ajm_u:818: aśaṭhavinayabhūṣaṇaḥ sadā hitam iti lambhayituṃ sa śakyate /
T09ajm_u:819: iti mama guṇapakṣapātinī namati matir guṇapakṣapātini // AJm_7.31 //
T09ajm_u:820: athainaṃ śakraḥ sādhūpapannarūpam idam iti cābhinandya samabhivṛddhaprasādaḥ punar vareṇopanimantrayām āsa /
T09ajm_u:821: kāmaṃ saṃtoṣasātmatvāt sarvatra kṛtam eva te /
T09ajm_u:822: madanugrahabuddhyā tu grahītuṃ varam arhasi // AJm_7.32 //
T09ajm_u:825: atha tasya parām upakartukāmatām avetya bodhisattvas tatpriyahitakāmyayā pradānānutarṣaprābalyam asmai prakāśayann uvāca /
T09ajm_u:826: tvadīyam annaṃ kṣayadoṣavarjitaṃ manaś ca ditsāparitoṣapeśalam /
T09ajm_u:827: viśuddhaśīlābharaṇāś ca yācakā mama syur etāṃ varasaṃpadaṃ vṛṇe // AJm_7.34 //
T09ajm_u:830: yad abhiprārthitaṃ sarvaṃ tat tathaiva bhaviṣyati /
T09ajm_u:831: dadāmi ca punas tubhyaṃ varam asmin subhāṣite // AJm_7.35 //
T09ajm_u:833: varaṃ mamānugrahasaṃpadākaraṃ dadāsi cet sarvadivaukasāṃ vara /
T09ajm_u:834: na mābhyupeyāḥ punar ity abhijvalann imaṃ varaṃ daityanisūdanaṃ vṛṇe // AJm_7.36 //
T09ajm_u:835: atha śakraḥ sāmarṣavad enam ativismayamāna uvāca /
T09ajm_u:837: japavratejyāvidhinā tapaḥśramair jano 'yam anvicchati darśanaṃ mama /
T09ajm_u:838: bhavān punar necchati kena hetunā varapraditsābhigatasya me sataḥ // AJm_7.37 //
T09ajm_u:842: na hy asāv adākṣiṇyānuvṛttir nāpy abahumānaviceṣṭitam asamavadhānakāmyatā vā bhavataḥ / kiṃ tu
T09ajm_u:843: nirīkṣya te rūpam amānuṣādbhutaṃ prasannakānti jvalitaṃ ca tejasā /
T09ajm_u:844: bhavet pramādas tapasīti me bhayaṃ prasādasaumyād api darśanāt tava // AJm_7.38 //
T09ajm_u:845: atha śakraḥ praṇamya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya cainaṃ tatraivāntardadhe /
T09ajm_u:846: prabhātāyāṃ ca rajanyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ śakraprabhāvopahṛtaṃ prabhūtaṃ divyam annapānaṃ dadarśa /
T09ajm_u:847: śakropanimantraṇāhūtāni cānekāni pratyekabuddhaśatāni vyāyatābaddhaparikarāṃś ca pariveṣaṇasajjān anekān devakumārān /
T09ajm_u:848: tenānnapānavidhinā sa munir maharṣīn saṃtarpayan mudam udāratamām avāpa /
T09ajm_u:849: vṛttyā ca tāpasajanocitayābhireme dhyānāpramāṇaniyamena śamena caiva // AJm_7.39 //
T09ajm_u:850: tad evaṃ tapovanasthānām apy alaṃkāras tyāgaśauryaṃ prāg eva gṛhasthānām iti
T09ajm_u:851: tyāgaśauryeṇālaṃkartavya evātmā satpuruṣeṇeti dānapatisaṃvarṇanāyām upaneyaṃ lobhadveṣabālavigarhāyāṃ
T09ajm_u:852: kalyāṇamitrasaṃparkaguṇe saṃtoṣakathāyāṃ tathāgatamāhātmye caivaṃ pūrvajanmasv api
T09ajm_u:853: subhāṣitaratnātiśayākaraḥ sa bhagavān prāg evābhisaṃbuddha iti //
T09ajm_u:859: lokānugrahānukūlair guṇātiśayair abhivardhamānaḥ sarvasattvamaitramanā maitrībalo nāma rājā babhūva /
T09ajm_u:860: duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vā yad abhūt prajānāṃ tasyāpi rājñas tad abhūt tathaiva /
T09ajm_u:861: ataḥ prajārakṣaṇadakṣiṇo 'sau śastraṃ ca śāstraṃ ca parāmamarśa // AJm_8.1 //
T09ajm_u:862: narendracūḍādhṛtaśāsanasya tasya tv alaṃkāravad āsa śastram /
T09ajm_u:863: vispaṣṭarūpaṃ dadṛśe ca śāstraṃ nayeṣu lokasya hitodayeṣu // AJm_8.2 //
T09ajm_u:864: vinigrahapragrahayoḥ pravṛttir dharmoparodhaṃ na cakāra tasya /
T09ajm_u:865: hitāśayatvān nayanaipuṇāc ca parīkṣakasyeva pituḥ prajāsu // AJm_8.3 //
T09ajm_u:866: tasyaivaṃ dharmeṇa prajāḥ pālayataḥ satyatyāgopaśamaprajñādibhiś ca parahitapariṇāmanāt
T09ajm_u:867: saviśeṣodāttakramair bodhisaṃbhāravidhibhir abhivardhamānasya kadā cit kasmiṃś cid
T09ajm_u:868: aparādhe yakṣāṇām adhipatinā svaviṣayāt pravrājitā ojohārāḥ pañca yakṣāḥ paravadhadakṣās
T09ajm_u:870: vyapagatasarvopadravatvāc ca nityapravṛttavividhotsavaṃ parayā saṃpadā samupetarūpaṃ
T09ajm_u:871: pramuditatuṣṭapuṣṭajanam abhisamīkṣya taṃ viṣayaṃ tadviṣayanivāsināṃ puruṣāṇām ojāṃsy
T09ajm_u:874: naiva tadviṣayasthānāṃ hartum ojaḥ prasehire // AJm_8.4 //
T09ajm_u:875: tasya prabhāvātiśayān nṛpasya mameti yatraiva babhūva buddhiḥ /
T09ajm_u:876: saivāsya rakṣā paramāsa tasmād ojāṃsi hartuṃ na viṣehire te // AJm_8.5 //
T09ajm_u:877: yadā ca param api prayatnaṃ kurvanto naiva śaknuvanti sma kasya cit tadviṣayanivāsina ojo 'pahartum athaiṣāṃ parasparam avekṣyaitad abhūt /
T09ajm_u:880: na santi caiṣām atha cādya sarve vyarthābhidhānatvam upāgatāḥ smaḥ // AJm_8.6 //
T09ajm_u:881: atha te yakṣā brāhmaṇavarṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya samanucaranto dadṛśuḥ pratyaraṇyacaram
T09ajm_u:882: anyatamaṃ gopālakaṃ saśādvale chāyādrumamūle sopānatkaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇaṃ sapallavair vanatarukusumair
T09ajm_u:883: viracitāṃ mālām udvahantaṃ dakṣiṇato vinyastadaṇḍaparaśum ekākinaṃ rajjuvartanavyāpṛtaṃ
T09ajm_u:884: prakṣveḍitavilāsena gāyantam āsīnaṃ samupetya cainam ūcuḥ /
T09ajm_u:886: evaṃ vivikte nirjanasaṃpāte 'sminn araṇye vicarann ekākī kathaṃ na bibheṣīti //
T09ajm_u:890: kiṃ tvayā na śrutapūrvā rakṣasāṃ piśācānāṃ vā nisargaraudrā prakṛtiḥ /
T09ajm_u:892: yebhyaḥ kathaṃ cit parimokṣam eti śauryād avajñātabhayo 'pi lokaḥ // AJm_8.7 //
T09ajm_u:893: tebhyo nṛmedaḥpiśitāśanebhyaḥ kathaṃ bhayaṃ te 'sti na rākṣasebhyaḥ /
T09ajm_u:895: ity ukte sa gopālakaḥ prahasyainān uvāca /
T09ajm_u:897: devendrair apy aśakyo 'yaṃ kiṃ punaḥ piśitāśanaiḥ // AJm_8.9 //
T09ajm_u:898: tena geha ivāraṇye rātrāv api yathā divā /
T09ajm_u:899: janānta iva caiko 'pi nirbhayo vicarāmy aham // AJm_8.10 //
T09ajm_u:900: athainaṃ te yakṣāḥ kautūhalaprābalyāt sādaram upavatsayanta ivocuḥ /
T09ajm_u:901: tat kathaya kathaya tāvad bhadra kīdṛśo 'yaṃ yuṣmākaṃ svastyayanaviśeṣa iti //
T09ajm_u:906: īdṛśo 'smākaṃ svastyayanaviśeṣa ity uktvā sāmarṣavismayas tān yakṣān avekṣamāṇaḥ punar uvāca /
T09ajm_u:908: evaṃ prakāśo nṛpatiprabhāvaḥ kathaṃ nu vaḥ śrotrapathaṃ na yātaḥ /
T09ajm_u:909: atyadbhutatvād athavā śruto 'pi bhavatsu vipratyayato na rūḍhaḥ // AJm_8.12 //
T09ajm_u:910: śaṅke guṇānveṣaṇaviklavo vā deśe jano 'sāv akutūhalo vā /
T09ajm_u:911: vivarjito bhāgyaparikṣayād vā kīrtyā narendrasya yato 'bhyupaitha // AJm_8.13 //
T09ajm_u:912: tad asti vo bhāgyaśeṣaṃ yat tādṛśād deśakāntārād ihāgatāḥ stha //
T09ajm_u:914: bhadra kiṃkṛto 'yam asya rājñaḥ prabhāvo yad asyāmānuṣā na prasahante viṣayanivāsinaṃ janaṃ hiṃsitum iti /
T09ajm_u:918: maitrī tasya balaṃ dhvajāgraśabalaṃ tv ācāramātraṃ balaṃ nāsau vetti ruṣaṃ na cāha paruṣaṃ samyak ca gāṃ rakṣati /
T09ajm_u:919: dharmas tasya nayo na nītinikṛtiḥ pūjārtham arthaḥ satām ity āścaryamayo 'pi durjanadhanaṃ garvaṃ ca nālambate // AJm_8.14 //
T09ajm_u:921: tenāsya na prasahante viṣayanivāsinaṃ janam upadravāḥ /
T09ajm_u:922: api ca kiyad ahaṃ vaḥ śakṣyāmi vaktum /
T09ajm_u:923: nṛpatiguṇaśravaṇakutūhalais tu bhavadbhir nagaram eva yuktaṃ praveṣṭuṃ syāt /
T09ajm_u:924: tatra hi bhavantaḥ svadharmānurāgād vyavasthitāryamaryādaṃ nityakṣemasubhikṣatvāt
T09ajm_u:926: tatkīrtyāśrayāḥ stutīr maṅgalam iva svastyayanam iva ca praharṣād abhyasyantaṃ janaṃ
T09ajm_u:928: satyāṃ ca guṇabahumānodbhāvanāyāṃ taddidṛkṣāyām avaśyaṃ tadguṇapratyakṣiṇo bhaviṣyatheti //
T09ajm_u:929: atha te yakṣāḥ svaprabhāvapratīghātāt tasmin rājani sā marṣahṛdayā bhāvaprayuktayāpi yuktayā tayā tathyayā guṇakathayā naiva mārdavam upajagmuḥ
T09ajm_u:931: yasmin vastuni tatkīrtyā tad viśeṣeṇa dahyate // AJm_8.15 //
T09ajm_u:932: pradānapriyatāṃ tu samabhivīkṣya rājñas te yakṣās tadapakāracikīrṣavaḥ samabhigamya rājānaṃ saṃdarśanakāle bhojanam ayācanta //
T09ajm_u:933: atha sa rājā pramuditamanās tadadhikṛtān puruṣān samādideśa /
T09ajm_u:934: kṣipram abhirucitaṃ bhojanaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dīyatām iti //
T09ajm_u:935: atha te yakṣāḥ samupahṛtaṃ rājārham api bhojanaṃ haritatṛṇam iva vyāghrā naiva pratyagṛhṇan naivaṃvidhaṃ bhojanaṃ vayam aśnīma iti /
T09ajm_u:936: tac chrutvā sa rājā samabhigamyainān abravīt /
T09ajm_u:938: yāvat tādṛśam anviṣyatām iti // yakṣā ūcuḥ /
T09ajm_u:940: ity annapānaṃ padmākṣa yakṣānām akṣatavrata // AJm_8.16 //
T09ajm_u:944: samavekṣya cainān sa rājā piśācāḥ khalv ime na mānuṣās tenāsmadīyam annapānaṃ nābhilaṣantīti niścayam upajagāma //
T09ajm_u:946: bhūyasī karuṇā teṣu samabhūc chuddhacetasaḥ // AJm_8.17 //
T09ajm_u:947: karuṇaikatānahṛdayaś ca tān yakṣān anuśocan niyatam īdṛśam arthaṃ cintayām āsa /
T09ajm_u:949: pratyahaṃ ca tad anveṣyaṃ kiṃ nu duḥkham ataḥ param // AJm_8.18 //
T09ajm_u:951: śaktasyāpy ahitābhyāsāt kiṃ svit kaṣṭataraṃ tataḥ // AJm_8.19 //
T09ajm_u:953: pretyeha caiṣāṃ dahatāṃ svam arthaṃ duḥkhāni yāsyanti kadā nu nāśam // AJm_8.20 //
T09ajm_u:954: tat katham idānīm aham eṣām āhārasaṃpādanād ekāham api tāvat parahiṃsāpraṇayavighātaṃ kuryām /
T09ajm_u:958: svataḥ śarīrāt sthirapīvarāṇi dāsyāmi māṃsāni saśoṇitāni /
T09ajm_u:959: ato 'nyathā ko hi mama kramaḥ syād ity āgateṣv arthiṣu yuktarūpaḥ // AJm_8.22 //
T09ajm_u:960: svayaṃmṛtānāṃ hi nirūṣmakāṇi bhavanti māṃsāni viśoṇitāni /
T09ajm_u:961: priyāṇi caiṣāṃ na hi tāni samyag bubhukṣayā pīḍitavigrahāṇām // AJm_8.23 //
T09ajm_u:962: jīvato 'pi ca kuto 'ham anyasmān māṃsam ādāsye mām abhigamya caite tathaiva kṣuttarṣaparikṣāmanayanavadanā
T09ajm_u:967: iti viniścitya sa rājā praharṣodgamāt sphītīkṛtanayanavadanaśobhaḥ svaśarīram upadarśayaṃs tān yakṣān uvāca /
T09ajm_u:968: amūni māṃsāni saśoṇitāni dhṛtāni lokasya hitārtham eva /
T09ajm_u:969: yady ātitheyatvam upeyur adya mahodayaḥ so 'bhyudayo mama syāt // AJm_8.25 //
T09ajm_u:970: atha te yakṣā jānanto 'pi rājñas tasyādhyāśayam atyadbhutatvād aśraddadhānā rājānam ūcuḥ /
T09ajm_u:972: jñātum arhati dātaiva prāptakālam ataḥ param // AJm_8.26 //
T09ajm_u:973: atha sa rājā 'numatam idam eṣām iti pramuditamanāḥ sirāmokṣaṇārthaṃ vaidyā ājñāpyantām iti samādideśa //
T09ajm_u:974: atha tasya rājño 'mātyāḥ svamāṃsaśoṇitapradānavyavasāyam avetya sasaṃbhramāmarṣavyākulahṛdayā vyaktam īdṛśaṃ kaṃ cid arthaṃ snehavaśād ūcuḥ
T09ajm_u:975: nārhati devaḥ pradānaharṣātirabhasād anuraktānāṃ prajānāṃ hitāhitakramam anavekṣitum /
T09ajm_u:977: yad yat prajānām ahitodayāya tat tat priyaṃ mānada rākṣasānām /
T09ajm_u:979: sukheṣv asaktaś ca bibharṣi deva rājyaśriyaṃ lokahitārtham eva /
T09ajm_u:980: svamāṃsadānavyavasāyam asmāt svaniścayonmārgam imaṃ vimuñca // AJm_8.28 //
T09ajm_u:981: asaṃśayaṃ na prasahanta ete tvadvīryaguptaṃ naravīra lokam /
T09ajm_u:982: anarthapāṇḍityahatās tathā hi nayena vāñchanty anayaṃ prajānām // AJm_8.29 //
T09ajm_u:983: medovasādyais tridaśā makheṣu prītiṃ hutāśābhihutair vrajanti /
T09ajm_u:984: satkārapūtaṃ bhavadīyam annaṃ saṃpannam eṣāṃ kila naiva rucyam // AJm_8.30 //
T09ajm_u:985: kāmaṃ nāsmadvidhajanādheyabuddhayo devapādāḥ svakāryānurāgas tv ayam asmān evam upacārapathād bhraṃśayati /
T09ajm_u:986: pañcānām amīṣām arthe sakalaṃ jagad anāthīkartavyam iti ko 'yaṃ dharmamārgo devasya /
T09ajm_u:988: kiṃkṛteyam asmāsv evaṃ niṣpraṇayatā kena vāsmākaṃ svāmyarthe viniyojyamānāni vinigūḍhapūrvāṇi māṃsaśoṇitāni yad aparikṣīṇeṣv evāmīṣu svāni devo dātum icchatīti //
T09ajm_u:989: atha sa rājā tān amātyān uvāca /
T09ajm_u:991: na dadāmīty asabhyaṃ vā vispaṣṭam api yācitaḥ // AJm_8.31 //
T09ajm_u:992: dharmavyavasthāsu puraḥsaraḥ san svayaṃ vrajeyaṃ yadi kāpathena /
T09ajm_u:993: asmadgatācārapathānugānāṃ bhaved avasthā mama kā prajānām // AJm_8.32 //
T09ajm_u:994: yataḥ prajā eva samīkṣamāṇaḥ sāraṃ śarīrād aham uddhariṣye /
T09ajm_u:995: kaś ca prabhāvo jagadarthasādhur mātsaryahāryālpahṛdo mama syāt // AJm_8.33 //
T09ajm_u:996: yad api cāsmatpremabahumānāvarjitaṃ praṇayaviśrambhagarbham abhidhīyate bhavadbhiḥ
T09ajm_u:997: kiṃkṛteyam asmāsv evaṃ niṣpraṇayatā yad aparikṣīṇeṣv eva no māṃsaśoṇiteṣu svāni devo
T09ajm_u:999: na khalu me yuṣmāsu pratihataviṣayaḥ praṇayamārgo viśrambhavirahāt pariśaṅkāgahanaduravagāho vā / kiṃ tu
T09ajm_u:1000: dhane tanutvaṃ kramaśo gate vā bhāgyānuvṛttyā kṣayam āgate vā /
T09ajm_u:1001: vijṛmbhamāṇapraṇayaḥ suhṛtsu śobheta na sphītadhanaḥ kṛśeṣu // AJm_8.34 //
T09ajm_u:1002: vivardhiteṣv arthijanārtham eva saṃvidyamāneṣu ca me bṛhatsu /
T09ajm_u:1003: gātreṣu māṃsopacayonnateṣu yuṣmāsv api syāt praṇayo virūpaḥ // AJm_8.35 //
T09ajm_u:1004: asaṃstutānām api ca kṣameya pīḍāṃ kathaṃ kaiva kathā bhavatsu /
T09ajm_u:1005: svāny eva māṃsāni yato 'smi ditsur māṃ caiva yācanta ime na yuṣmān // AJm_8.36 //
T09ajm_u:1007: anucitaḥ khalv ayam atrabhavatām asmadartheṣu samudācāraḥ /
T09ajm_u:1008: mīmāṃsitavyam api ca tāvad etat syāt /
T09ajm_u:1009: svārtham annādi ditsantaṃ kathaṃ syāt pratiṣedhayan /
T09ajm_u:1010: sādhuvṛttir asādhur vā prāg evaivaṃvidhaṃ vidhim // AJm_8.37 //

T09ajm_u:2081: te supāragapremabahumānāvarjitamatibhir devatābhir anupradarśitebhyaḥ sthalebhya ādāya vālikāpāṣāṇabuddhyā vaiḍūryādīni ratnāni vahanam āropayām āsuḥ //
T09ajm_u:2082: tenaiva caikarātreṇa sā naur bharukaccham upajagāma //
T09ajm_u:2084: svadeśatīrāntam upāgatās te prītyā tam ānarcur udīrṇaharṣāḥ // AJm_14.33 //
T09ajm_u:2085: tad evaṃ dharmāśrayaṃ satyavacanam apy āpadaṃ nudati prāg eva tatphalam iti dharmānuvartinā bhavitavyam //
T09ajm_u:2086: kalyāṇamitrāśrayavarṇe 'pi vācyam evaṃ kalyāṇamitrāśritāḥ śreyaḥ prāpnuvantīti //
T09ajm_u:2089: śīlavatām ihaivābhiprāyāḥ kalyāṇāḥ samṛdhyanti prāg eva paratreti śīlaviśuddhau prayatitavyam //
T09ajm_u:2093: svabhyastabhāvāc ca bahuṣu janmāntareṣu parārthacaryāyās tatrastho 'pi parahitasukhopapādanasavyāpāro babhūva /
T09ajm_u:2094: abhyāsayogād dhi śubhāśubhāni karmāṇi sātmy eva bhavanti puṃsām /
T09ajm_u:2095: tathāvidhāny eva yad aprayatnāj janmāntare svapna ivācaranti // AJm_15.1 //
T09ajm_u:2096: iṣṭānām iva ca sveṣām apatyānām upari niviṣṭahārdo sa mahāsattvas teṣāṃ mīnānāṃ dānapriyavacanārthacaryādikramaiḥ param anugrahaṃ cakāra /
T09ajm_u:2098: yogād upāyajñatayā ca teṣāṃ vismārayām āsa sa matsyavṛttam // AJm_15.2 //
T09ajm_u:2099: tat tena samyak paripālyamānaṃ vṛddhiṃ parāṃ mīnakulaṃ jagāma /
T09ajm_u:2100: puraṃ vinirmuktam ivopasargair nyāyapravṛttena narādhipena // AJm_15.3 //
T09ajm_u:2101: atha kadā cit sattvānāṃ bhāgyasaṃpadvaikalyāt pramādāc ca varṣādhikṛtānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ na samyag devo vavarṣa /
T09ajm_u:2102: asamyag varṣiṇi ca deve tat saraḥ phullakadambakusumagaureṇa navasalilena na yathāpūrvam āpupūre /
T09ajm_u:2103: krameṇa copagate nidāghasamaye paṭutaradīptibhiḥ khedālasagatibhir iva ca dinakarakiraṇais
T09ajm_u:2104: tadabhitaptayā ca dharaṇyā jvālānugateneva ca hlādābhilāṣiṇā mārutena tarṣavaśād
T09ajm_u:2105: iva pratyaham āpīyamānaṃ tat saraḥ palvalībabhūva /
T09ajm_u:2106: nidāghakālajvalito vivasvāñ jvālāvakarṣīva paṭuś ca vāyuḥ /
T09ajm_u:2107: jvarāturevāśiśirā ca bhūmis toyāni roṣād iva śoṣayanti // AJm_15.4 //
T09ajm_u:2108: atha bodhisattvo vāyasagaṇair api pratarkyamāṇaṃ prāg eva salilatīrāntacāribhiḥ pakṣigaṇair
T09ajm_u:2109: viṣādadainyavaśagaṃ vispanditamātraparāyaṇaṃ mīnakulam avekṣya karuṇāyamāṇaś cintām āpede /
T09ajm_u:2112: adyāpi ca cireṇaiva lakṣyate jaladāgamaḥ // AJm_15.5 //
T09ajm_u:2113: apayānakramo nāsti netāpy anyatra ko bhavet /
T09ajm_u:2114: asmadvyasanasaṃhṛṣṭāḥ samāyānti ca no dviṣaḥ // AJm_15.6 //
T09ajm_u:2116: sphuranto bhakṣayiṣyante śatrubhir mama paśyataḥ // AJm_15.7 //
T09ajm_u:2117: tat kim atra prāptakālaṃ syād iti vimṛśan sa mahātmā satyādhiṣṭhānam ekam ārtāyanaṃ dadarśa /
T09ajm_u:2118: karuṇayā ca samāpīḍyamānahṛdayo dīrgham uṣṇam abhiniśvasya nabhaḥ samullokayann uvāca /
T09ajm_u:2119: smarāmi na prāṇivadhaṃ yathāhaṃ saṃcintya kṛcchre parame 'pi kartum /
T09ajm_u:2120: anena satyena sarāṃsi toyair āpūrayan varṣatu devarājaḥ // AJm_15.8 //
T09ajm_u:2121: atha tasya mahātmanaḥ puṇyopacayaguṇāt satyādhiṣṭhānabalāt tadabhiprasāditadevanāgayakṣānubhāvāc
T09ajm_u:2122: ca samantatas toyāvalambibimbā gambhīramadhuranirghoṣā vidyullatālaṃkṛtā nīlavipulaśikharā
T09ajm_u:2123: vijṛmbhamāṇā iva pravisarpibhiḥ śikharabhujaiḥ pariṣvajyamānā iva cānyonyam akālameghāḥ
T09ajm_u:2125: diśāṃ pramiṇvanta iva prayāmaṃ śṛṅgair vitanvanta ivāndhakāram /
T09ajm_u:2126: nabhastalādarśagatā virejuś chāyā girīṇām iva kālameghāḥ // AJm_15.9 //
T09ajm_u:2127: saṃsaktakekaiḥ śikhibhiḥ prahṛṣṭaiḥ saṃstūyamānā iva nṛttacitraiḥ /
T09ajm_u:2128: prasaktamandrastanitā virejur dhīraprahāsā iva te ghanaughāḥ // AJm_15.10 //
T09ajm_u:2129: muktā vimuktā iva tair vimuktā dhārā nipetuḥ praśaśāma reṇuḥ /
T09ajm_u:2130: gandhaś cacārānibhṛto dharaṇyāṃ vikīryamāṇo jaladānilena // AJm_15.11 //
T09ajm_u:2133: muhur muhuḥ kāñcanapiñjarābhir bhābhir digantān anurañjayantī /
T09ajm_u:2135: atha bodhisattvaḥ samantato 'bhiprasṛtair āpāṇḍubhiḥ salilapravāhair āpūryamāṇe sarasi
T09ajm_u:2136: dhārānipātasamakālam eva vidrute vāyasādye pakṣigaṇe pratilabdhajīvitāśe pramudite
T09ajm_u:2137: mīnagaṇe prītyābhisāryamāṇahṛdayo varṣanivṛttisāśaṅkaḥ punaḥ punaḥ parjanyam ābabhāṣe /
T09ajm_u:2138: udgarja parjanya gabhīradhīraṃ pramodam udvāsaya vāyasānām /
T09ajm_u:2140: tad upaśrutya śakro devānām indraḥ paramavismitamanāḥ sākṣād abhigamyainam abhisaṃrādhayann uvāca /
T09ajm_u:2141: tavaiva khalv eṣa mahānubhāva matsyendra satyātiśayaprabhāvaḥ /
T09ajm_u:2142: āvarjitā yat kalaśā iveme kṣaranti ramyastanitāḥ payodāḥ // AJm_15.15 //
T09ajm_u:2143: mahatpramādaskhalitaṃ tv idaṃ me yan nāma kṛtyeṣu bhavadvidhānām /
T09ajm_u:2144: lokārtham abhyutthitamānasānāṃ vyāpārayogaṃ na samabhyupaimi // AJm_15.16 //
T09ajm_u:2145: cintāṃ kṛthā mā tad ataḥ paraṃ tvaṃ satāṃ hi kṛtyodvahane 'smi dhuryaḥ /
T09ajm_u:2146: deśo 'py ayaṃ tvadguṇasaṃśrayeṇa na bhūya evaṃ bhavitārtivaśyaḥ // AJm_15.17 //
T09ajm_u:2148: tac ca saraḥ parāṃ toyasamṛddhim avāpa //
T09ajm_u:2149: tad evaṃ śīlavatām ihaivābhiprāyāḥ kalyāṇāḥ samṛdhyanti prāg eva paratreti śīlaviśuddhau prayatitavyam iti //
